reviews.review_msg: She is enthusiastic and is there to help if you ask. However, I feel like I didn't learn much from the class. Having taken preceding JAPN classes here, I feel like I learned more in the previous class than this one..  Seems easy enough to get a good grade. She grades by effort not so much 'ability'  Textbook is used in class, but not examinable

A little bit abrasive sometimes, but she's got it where it counts. She's very sharp, and her background in linguistics makes her feedback very nuanced. Put in the effort (attend all classes, put lots of work into assignments/projects/kanji etc.) and you will do well. She's been teaching since the early 80s, so laziness and winging it won't do.
